ygData.subject: Re: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: GZ lied :p  When I equip my trade gear (raises int to 150) I gain about a bar and half of mana. Rokenn ...
ygData.messageBody:
GZ lied :p When I equip my trade gear (raises int to 150) I gain about a
bar and half of mana.

Rokenn


>From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Re: Missing Songs!!
>Date: Tue, 15 Feb 2000 13:40:39 -0500
>
>I thought Bard mana was based on Dex and Cha. Isn't that what GZ said a
>long time ago??
>
>
>Wayne
>
> > From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
> > Subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
> >
> > A group heal song that uses mana. Have it convert all your mana into HP
> > (say 1 hp for each mana point) and devided amoung all party members. By
>my
> > estimates I had a little less then 1000 mana at 45th with 90 int. This
> > would give a reason for our class armor to have +int bonuses. Given the
> > huge taunt factor of group heals this song would be fairly balanced
>
>
